Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to prohibiting delivery services from guaranteeing thirty-minute delivery and prohibiting such services from penalizing workers for failure to deliver within thirty minutes
Summary: Requires a disclaimer to be included in any advertising for delivery services that advertise delivery within thirty minutes or less to say that delivery within such time is not guaranteed; prohibits delivery services from penalizing workers that fail to deliver within thirty minutes; requires disclosure to such workers that they are not required to deliver within thirty minutes.
LawCode: Add ยง391-x, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting delivery services from guaranteeing thirty-minute delivery and prohibiting such services from penalizing workers for failure to deliver within thirty minutes
